migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.

migrations.description: Moves affected.defaultBase to defaultBase in `nx.json`

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 19-2-2-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Set project name in nx.json explicitly
migrations.name: 19-2-4-set-project-name

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~17.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-17-1-0

migrations.description: Add 'browser-sync' as dev dependency when '@angular-devkit/build-angular:ssr-dev-server' or '@nx/angular:module-federation-dev-ssr' is used.
migrations.name: add-browser-sync-dependency

migrations.description: Add 'autoprefixer' as dev dependency when '@nx/angular:ng-packagr-lite' or '@nx/angular:package` is used.
migrations.name: add-autoprefixer-dependency

migrations.description: Add NX_MF_DEV_SERVER_STATIC_REMOTES to inputs for task hashing when '@nx/angular:webpack-browser' is used for Module Federation.
migrations.name: add-module-federation-env-var-to-target-defaults

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~17.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-17-2-0

migrations.description: Ensure targetDefaults inputs for task hashing when '@nx/angular:webpack-browser' is used are correct for Module Federation.
migrations.name: fix-target-defaults-for-webpack-browser

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~17.3.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-17-3-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~18.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-18-0-0

migrations.description: Installs the '@typescript-eslint/utils' package when having installed '@angular-eslint/eslint-plugin' or '@angular-eslint/eslint-plugin-template' with version >=18.0.0.
migrations.name: add-typescript-eslint-utils

migrations.description: Migrate no-extra-semi rules into user config, out of nx extendable configs
migrations.name: update-19-1-0-rename-no-extra-semi

migrations.description: Update to Cypress ^13.6.6 if the workspace is using Cypress v13 to ensure workspaces don't use v13.6.5 which has an issue when verifying Cypress.
migrations.name: update-cypress-version-13-6-6

migrations.description: Move executor options to target defaults
migrations.name: move-options-to-target-defaults

migrations.description: Updates two-way bindings that have an invalid expression to use the longform expression instead.
migrations.name: invalid-two-way-bindings

migrations.description: Replace deprecated HTTP related modules with provider functions
migrations.name: migration-http-providers
